repl_description:
Interactive visualization system for Illinois hospital facilities, displaying real-time bed capacity information and facility locations. The system features hospital markers with adjustable radius zones (1-20 miles), comprehensive bed capacity metrics, statistical data display, and dynamic data updates based on radius selection.

Tech Stack:
• Streamlit (deployed via Replit)
• Interactive mapping libraries
• Real-time data processing
• Statistical analytics tools
• Geolocation services
